title: Sample Book, 1850–60
dimensions: Sample book: 28 W x 32.5 L x 3.5 H cm
description: Blue cloth bound volume of 366 numbered samples of printed cotton. Samples of floral and plaid stripes. Title page has two book plates. Book title: "Cotton Prints Samples"

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book, 1850–60.
1850–60. Medium: paper, cotton
printed. Gift of Virginia Hamill Johnson. 1973-6-6.
